mailmergetemplate.name: Follow-up to a Meeting
mailmergetemplate.description: Use this template to thank contacts for meeting with you and to let them know you’ll be sending them a proposal.

mailmergetemplate.name: Happy Birthday Note - Gift Certificate
mailmergetemplate.description: Use this template to acknowledge a customer’s birthday and offer them a gift certificate for a product or service.

mailmergetemplate.name: Lead Reply - Tradeshow Visit
mailmergetemplate.description: Use this template to thank leads for visiting your booth at a trade show and to let them know you’ll be responding to their requests for more information.

mailmergetemplate.name: Marketing Event Notification
mailmergetemplate.description: Use this template to notify leads of an upcoming event or promotion.

mailmergetemplate.name: Product Catalog Cover Letter
mailmergetemplate.description: Use this template to create a cover letter for a product catalog.

mailmergetemplate.name: Proposal Cover Letter
mailmergetemplate.description: Use this template to create a cover letter for a proposal.

mailmergetemplate.name: Quote For Customer
mailmergetemplate.description: Use this template to create a quote with data from Microsoft Dynamics CRM.

mailmergetemplate.name: Reconnect with Accounts
mailmergetemplate.description: Use this template to reconnect with accounts that you have not communicated with recently.

mailmergetemplate.name: Reconnect with Contacts - Gift Certificate
mailmergetemplate.description: Use this template to reconnect with contacts that you have not communicated with recently and to offer them a gift certificate for a product or service.

mailmergetemplate.name: Reconnect with Contacts
mailmergetemplate.description: Use this template to reconnect with contacts that you have not communicated with recently.
